[vc_row type="full_width_background" full_screen_row_position="middle" column_margin="90px" scene_position="center" text_color="dark" text_align="left" top_padding="10%" bottom_padding="4%" overlay_strength="0.3" shape_divider_position="bottom" bg_image_animation="none" shape_type=""][vc_column column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="2/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom"][vc_column_text]

Ellevens and Gareth Bale aimed to create an esports team for sports fans

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]Historically, traditional sports fans don't really mesh well with the esports community. However, with soccer superstar Gareth Bale acting as a bridge between those two cultures things started to look differently. Gareth's agency reached out to AoE Creative and asked for assistance in creating an esports team brand from scratch.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]After running through the initial exercises of brand building, Ellevens looked to be a team focused on excellence, community, and creativity. Keeping that in mind while going into the look and feel stage brought about the idea of painting and brush strokes. The idea is simple, yet is pure, honest, and personal.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_row_inner column_margin="none" bottom_padding="20" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567618201809{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

Scope

[/vc_column_text][fancy-ul icon_type="standard_dot" alignment="left" spacing="default"]
  • Brand Development
  • Brand Voice And Tone

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]Nerd Street Gamers (NSG) had started as a passion project in Philadelphia and grown to the point where they are working with major endemic and non endemic companies to the gaming space. They came to AoE Creative looking for a full rebrand that showed they were a professional company that had not lost touch with it's roots in gaming.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]We worked on first establishing the brand core values and pillars and from there established a voice and tone for the brand that felt professional yet conversational. After we began establishing a look and feel for the brand that carried this theme of being "adaptable". Easy Transition

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Through working with their team we not only provided the documents, but we provided a launch strategy to help NSG transition into the new look.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_column_text]

Amazing Results

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]NSG has taken the rebrand in stride and continues to push the boundries in the gaming and esports space while looking great doing it.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner column_margin="90px" top_padding="30" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="padding-2-percent" column_padding_position="right" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom"][nectar_single_testimonial testimonial_style="basic" quote="Its time our logo, graphic design, and the spelling of our name reflected those values. " name="Nerd Street Gamers"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row type="full_width_background" full_screen_row_position="middle" column_margin="90px" scene_position="center" text_color="dark" text_align="left" top_padding="10%" bottom_padding="4%" overlay_strength="0.3" shape_divider_position="bottom" bg_image_animation="none" shape_type=""][vc_column column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="2/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom"][vc_column_text]

PVP Live is an example of company that could evolve while staying connected with it's roots.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]PVP Live set out to be the gaming and esports communities go to news resource for all things nerd. The company had a variety of ways to handle traffic from the website to Youtube content.

The problem they were facing is how to get this content in front of the community.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]I ran the digital and influencer marketing side of the company.

This meant working with a variety of influencers from personalities to Facebook pages that would help promote the content through posts and streams.

I was also responsible for putting content out on social media platforms and finding the right ways to engage with a growing audience.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_row_inner column_margin="none" bottom_padding="20" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567618201809{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

item.title: Immortal: Gates Of Pyre - Video Producing
item.dc:creator: nebtune

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
[vc_row type="full_width_background" full_screen_row_position="middle" column_margin="90px" scene_position="center" text_color="dark" text_align="left" top_padding="10%" bottom_padding="2%" overlay_strength="0.3" shape_divider_position="bottom" bg_image_animation="none" shape_type=""][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="2/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom"][vc_column_text]

Effective Video Production

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]With the marketing for Immortal: Gates of Pyre ramping up, the AOE team was looking effectively kill two birds with one stone.
  • Build up the Youtube channel with new content
  • Generate additional content for social media without additional time commitments
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]I lead the project with these goals in mind to build Youtube content made of multiple smaller segments to be clipped from the original video and given to the social media team as ammo. This involved a lot of close work with the Sunspear Games, graphic design, motion, marketing, and video editing teams to create strong final products.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_row_inner column_margin="none" bottom_padding="20" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567618201809{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

Scope

[/vc_column_text][fancy-ul icon_type="standard_dot" alignment="left" spacing="default"]
  • Video Producing
  • Project Management
  • Social Media Strategy

Optic Gaming was a legacy brand that needed fresh ideas.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]When first working on the legendary Optic brand, the fan base was not being properly engaged. The team had begun to turn things around on social media, but the look of Optic was dated. There were no values that were associated with the team. I worked with the marketing team to establish the new motto[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]Power. Precision. Prestige. Power - Since Optic and the fanbase were very alpha, elite, and dominate. Precision - Optic's origins began as a COD sniper montage team. Prestige - Every year new titles come out for COD and the team begins to learn to again to be the best in the league.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]The event side of Optic was non existent. I worked together with the team to create a variety of events around the re-launch of the Optic brand and the championship Gears of War team. These activations varied from special ops themed scavenger hunts to playing with the pros.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_row_inner column_margin="none" bottom_padding="20" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567618201809{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

Texas banded together around the Houston Outlaws

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]For the opening season of Overwatch League, I was tasked with local marketing for the Houston Outlaws. My goal was to grow, connect, and engage a brand new audience of Overwatch fans spread out across Houston, Austin, and San Antonio. The award winning #BandTogether campaign successfully brought together fans all across south Texas together for watch parties, block parties, pop up shops, player tours, and trade shows.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]We also enabled them to show their colors through a variety of limited, collectible, and region specific merchandise. The goal being that fans would travel from all over Texas to attend events, meet their community, and trade effectively to have the full collection.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_row_inner column_margin="none" bottom_padding="20" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567618201809{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

The Most Talked About Overwatch League Team

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]While achieving critical acclaim, the Outlaws also held the public interest. They were also the most tweeted about team of Overwatch League in season 1.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner column_margin="90px" top_padding="30" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="padding-2-percent" column_padding_position="right" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom"][nectar_single_testimonial testimonial_style="basic" quote="Band Together is the movement that pushed the brand over the top and into the hearts of the Texas gaming community. Through trailblazing events it united the fanbase and made it fun to be an Outlaws fan!" name="Von" subtitle="Co-Founder, Lonestar Vanguard"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row type="full_width_background" full_screen_row_position="middle" column_margin="90px" scene_position="center" text_color="dark" text_align="left" top_padding="10%" bottom_padding="2%" overlay_strength="0.3" shape_divider_position="bottom" bg_image_animation="none" shape_type=""][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="2/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom"][vc_column_text]

Adding A Splash Of Color

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]Tourney Locator (TLOC) reached out about a trailer for their upcoming tournament Low Tide City. The unique theme of this event was throwing a Smash Bros tournament at USA's largest indoor waterpark that was filled with amenities.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]I happily lead the project providing direction on video and motion graphics. Additionally, provided light social media strategy for launch.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_row_inner column_margin="none" bottom_padding="20" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567618201809{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

Scope

[/vc_column_text][fancy-ul icon_type="standard_dot" alignment="left" spacing="default"]
  • Video Producing
  • Video Concepting
  • Project Management
[/fancy-ul][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_width_background" full_screen_row_position="middle" column_margin="80px" scene_position="center" text_color="dark" text_align="left" top_padding="8%" bottom_padding="8%" overlay_strength="0.3" shape_divider_position="bottom" bg_image_animation="none" shape_type=""][vc_column column_padding="padding-2-percent" column_padding_position="bottom" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="default" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567863257459{padding-right: 25% !important;}"]

Project Outcome

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="2/3" tablet_width_inherit="default" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_row_inner column_margin="90px" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="padding-3-percent" column_padding_position="bottom" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom"][vc_column_text]Instantly Booked[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Within hours of announcing the event, TLOC reached their max cap sold. See below for the trailer created for the event.[/vc_column_text][nectar_video_lightbox link_style="play_button_2" nectar_play_button_color="Default-Accent-Color" image_url="464" hover_effect="defaut" box_shadow="none" border_radius="none" play_button_size="larger" video_url="http://nabilpervez.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/LTC-Full-Smol.mp4"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

As co-founder and CTO at AOE Creative, I have lead teams to create award-winning marketing campaigns and customized brand building for our clients. Mixed with my experience in promotion and content strategies, I believe through collaboration and innovation we can elevate the gaming community. Notable clients include Riot Games, Redbull, LEGO, Blizzard Activision, Paramount, Houston Outlaws, & Optic Gaming. Immortal Gates of Pyre (my latest video game project) will be available in 2024. My personal passions include looking for delicious food, being a board member of the Dallas IGDA (International Game Developers Association), and volunteering in the local Islamic community.[/vc_column_text][divider line_type="No Line" custom_height="50"][vc_custom_heading text="What I Do" font_container="tag:h5|text_align:left|color:rgba(255%2C255%2C255%2C0.6)" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1485271340468{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}"][vc_row_inner column_margin="default" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][fancy-ul icon_type="none" alignment="left" spacing="default"]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
[vc_row type="full_width_background" full_screen_row_position="middle" column_margin="90px" scene_position="center" text_color="dark" text_align="left" top_padding="10%" bottom_padding="2%" overlay_strength="0.3" shape_divider_position="bottom" bg_image_animation="none" shape_type=""][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="2/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom"][vc_column_text]

Building a look and a home for Geekletes

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]When we met Geekletes, we found individuals with a ton of passion that were deeply connected in the local NBA 2K community. They had found themselves in a unique position with a new venue, but were in need of direction.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]I lead the project to provide Geekletes a look and feel and direction with it's local events efforts. Additionally, this came with local marketing strategies and influencer marketing for the DFW metroplex.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_row_inner column_margin="none" bottom_padding="20" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567618201809{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

Scope

[/vc_column_text][fancy-ul icon_type="standard_dot" alignment="left" spacing="default"]
  • Community Building
  • Event Marketing
  • Project Management
  • Social Media Strategy
  • Partnership Development
  • Influencer Management
  • Website Consulting
[/fancy-ul][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="in_container" full_screen_row_position="middle" column_margin="default" scene_position="center" text_color="dark" text_align="left" overlay_strength="0.3" shape_divider_position="bottom" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][image_with_animation image_url="406" alignment="" animation="Fade In" hover_animation="none" border_radius="none" box_shadow="none" image_loading="default" max_width="100%" max_width_mobile="default"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_width_background" full_screen_row_position="middle" column_margin="80px" scene_position="center" text_color="dark" text_align="left" top_padding="8%" bottom_padding="8%" overlay_strength="0.3" shape_divider_position="bottom" bg_image_animation="none" shape_type=""][vc_column column_padding="padding-2-percent" column_padding_position="bottom" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="default" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567863257459{padding-right: 25% !important;}"]

Project Outcome

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="2/3" tablet_width_inherit="default" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_row_inner column_margin="90px" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="padding-3-percent" column_padding_position="bottom" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom"][vc_column_text]

Successful Launch

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Geekletes were able to have an incredibly successful launch and generate a ton of local attention.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_column_text]

Strong Local Connections

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Becoming partnered with the local fighting game communities brought in a consistent audience to the venue.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row type="full_width_background" full_screen_row_position="middle" column_margin="90px" scene_position="center" text_color="dark" text_align="left" top_padding="10%" bottom_padding="2%" overlay_strength="0.3" shape_divider_position="bottom" bg_image_animation="none" shape_type=""][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="2/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom"][vc_column_text]

Texas banded together around the Houston Outlaws

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]For the opening season of Overwatch League, I was tasked with local marketing for the Houston Outlaws. My goal was to grow, connect, and engage a brand new audience of Overwatch fans spread out across Houston, Austin, and San Antonio. The award winning #BandTogether campaign successfully brought together fans all across south Texas together for watch parties, block parties, pop up shops, player tours, and trade shows.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]We also enabled them to show their colors through a variety of limited, collectible, and region specific merchandise. Aiming For A Bullseye

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]Our friends at Redbull came to us with a unique problem. They had a new wheel in experience for live events. A quick and easy way to make a gaming station for people to come have a Redbull and take a load off while enjoying some games with friends. The problem was the product looked like a massive Redbull can and they prefer to feel more subtle. Our team went to work on putting together moodboards to eventually designing multiple looks for the Redbull team to use for any type of event.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_row_inner column_margin="none" bottom_padding="20" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567618201809{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

Texas banded together around the Houston Outlaws

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]For the opening season of Overwatch League, I was tasked with local marketing for the Houston Outlaws. My goal was to grow, connect, and engage a brand new audience of Overwatch fans spread out across Houston, Austin, and San Antonio. The award winning #BandTogether campaign successfully brought together fans all across south Texas together for watch parties, block parties, pop up shops, player tours, and trade shows.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]We also enabled them to show their colors through a variety of limited, collectible, and region specific merchandise. The goal being that fans would travel from all over Texas to attend events, meet their community, and trade effectively to have the full collection.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_row_inner column_margin="none" bottom_padding="20" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567618201809{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

Award Winning Campaign

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Through the Outlaws, we achieved a lot of firsts in esports. The first player tour, pop up shop, and block party all contributed to being a Tempest Award winning campaign.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_column_text]

The Most Talked About Overwatch League Team

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]While achieving critical acclaim, the Outlaws also held the public interest. They were also the most tweeted about team of Overwatch League in season 1.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner column_margin="90px" top_padding="30" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="padding-2-percent" column_padding_position="right" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom"][nectar_single_testimonial testimonial_style="basic" quote="Band Together is the movement that pushed the brand over the top and into the hearts of the Texas gaming community. item.dc:creator: nebtune

[vc_row type="full_width_background" full_screen_row_position="middle" column_margin="90px" scene_position="center" text_color="dark" text_align="left" top_padding="10%" bottom_padding="2%" overlay_strength="0.3" shape_divider_position="bottom" bg_image_animation="none" shape_type=""][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="2/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom"][vc_column_text]

Unifying Look And Functionality

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]While working through design for the overall look and feel for Immortal: Gates of Pyre, AOE was approached by SSG to create the look and feel of the UI for the game. The scope was pretty large and with tight turnarounds on multiple components to help with implementation for different alphas and betas.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]My role was to lead the design team with the goal of finding a functional, intuitive, and beautiful UI that Sunspear was looking for. While also working with the Sunspear development team to build something that is efficient use of hardware resources and does not affect the games frame rate. This involved solid communication between the design and SSG team.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_row_inner column_margin="none" bottom_padding="20" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567618201809{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

Community Building In A Pandemic

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]The Dallas IGDA runs a yearly party to bring the community together for a night of fun and celebrating our culture. However with the COVID19 pandemic running rampant, in person gatherings were limited. We decided to shift to an online format[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]I decided to take the initiative to work with a design team to put together a look and feel for the event, generate social graphics, and spearhead the marketing campaign. Additionally, worked with the team to develop unique online events to make the night fun for attendees.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_row_inner column_margin="none" bottom_padding="20" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567618201809{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

Building The Framework

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]The Sunspear Games team approached us to design a full website for their upcoming game Immortal: Gates Of Pyre. They wanted to not only have a website that clearly explained their game, they wanted to also touch on lore while keeping their fans up to date with news and updates. It was especially important that this launched in parallel with their Kickstarter so fans would have a place to go to for additional information and clarity that the Kickstarter platform might not provide.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]I lead the project on both the design and development side. My means to do was effectively communicate with the client, our designers, and the web developers everyone's goals and intended functionality of the website. This included me leading the idea of what would be the ideal flow for the user and understanding the goal of each page. We built the website with the intention to be able to scale effectively as Immortal continues to add to the roster to have a cast comparable to League of Legends[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_row_inner column_margin="none" bottom_padding="20" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567618201809{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

Project Outcome

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="2/3" tablet_width_inherit="default" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]Successful Launch The website launched as the perfect compliment to the successful Kickstarter. It answered a lot of users questions, taught them to play the game, and gave them a strong sense of what makes Immortal different. See for yourself at gatesofpyre.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]Blizzard approached us for the opportunity to be the first agency of record to work directly with studio to put assets in Overwatch. We jumped at the opportunity and reached out to work with the perfect illustrator, Evan Eckart[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]We immediately began working with every Overwatch team to brainstorm, revise, and eventually create in-game sprays the fans could be proud of.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_row_inner column_margin="none" bottom_padding="20" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567618201809{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

Anime Unchained

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]A-KON had solidified itself as one of the largest anime conventions in all of America and the largest in Texas. However, the brand was due for a refresh after remaining the same for two decades.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]Our approach was to better understand what a modern A-KON looks, thinks, and speaks like. I lead the project and assisted with branding, marketing concepts, event concepts, and web design consulting.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_row_inner column_margin="none" bottom_padding="20" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567618201809{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

See below for the launch trailer[/vc_column_text][nectar_video_lightbox link_style="play_button_2" nectar_play_button_color="Default-Accent-Color" image_url="439" hover_effect="defaut" box_shadow="none" border_radius="none" play_button_size="larger" video_url="http://nabilpervez.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/75oohq.mp4"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Kickstarting The Evolution Of RTS

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]The SunSpear Games team were looking to achieve a couple of goals with the Kickstarter
  • Build additional funding for development
  • Build a community of engaged users
  • Generate press around Immortal: Gates Of Pyre
This process overall took months from strategy to implementation. The first step of the process was user aquisition and keeping users engaged in a Discord, ready to go for when the Kickstarter launched. This was followed by building an influencer roster that would support the build up and launch of the campaign. Next, connecting with the Kickstarter team and making sure to understand the rules and guidelines to becoming a "Project Kickstarter Loves" and being successful. Then came the execution of the marketing strategy to build up attention around IMMORTAL. This included videos for social media and Youtube. Simultaneously, we built brand new branding around the Kickstarter. Next were all the details around it, focusing on cutting a trailer - organization of items, rewards, etc.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]I managed the Kickstarter project from all the angles - keeping marketing, design, developers, partnerships, and video teams on track. I was very closely tied to
  • Branding
  • Project Management
  • Video Production
  • Community Marketing
  • Kickstarter management and partnerships
What you will see below are assets created for the successful Immortal: Gates Of Pyre Kickstarter. See the Kickstarter for yourself[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_row_inner column_margin="none" bottom_padding="20" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567618201809{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

item.title: Immortal: Gates Of Pyre - Lorebook + Videos
item.dc:creator: nebtune

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
[vc_row type="full_width_background" full_screen_row_position="middle" column_margin="90px" scene_position="center" text_color="dark" text_align="left" top_padding="10%" bottom_padding="2%" overlay_strength="0.3" shape_divider_position="bottom" bg_image_animation="none" shape_type=""][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="2/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom"][vc_column_text]

Printing The Universe

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]With the world of IMMORTAL: Gates Of Pyre expanding, the SunSpear Games team was looking for a way to consolidate all their lore into something bite sized. We aimed to create a lore book that the average user to big league investor would find accessible. Additionally, we aimed to create videos to pair along with the book to supplement the meetings with investors that were struggling to visualize the full picture of Immortal.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]Leading the project mean becoming the bridge between the Immortal creative team and the AOE design team. Clearly communicating expectations, capabilities, and timing was key. Working together we put together a beautiful lore book to be proud of that won Sunspear a lot of business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_row_inner column_margin="none" bottom_padding="20" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567618201809{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

Project Outcome

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="2/3" tablet_width_inherit="default" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_row_inner column_margin="90px" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="padding-3-percent" column_padding_position="bottom" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom"][vc_column_text]

Printed Book

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Not only has the digital format of the book been really successful with investors, but it has become one of the items users purchased on the Kickstarter and is currently being physically printed.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]

Released Videos

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Users found the videos helpful for understanding the world IMMORTAL: Gates Of Pyre is building.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

<iframe title="The Origins of Creation | An IMMORTAL: Gates of Pyre Lore Narration" width="1080" height="608" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZpPNpv85d3A?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

<iframe title="The Call | An IMMORTAL: Gate of Pyre Lore Narration" width="1080" height="608" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4JAVW0NF-NI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

[vc_row type="full_width_background" full_screen_row_position="middle" column_margin="90px" scene_position="center" text_color="dark" text_align="left" top_padding="10%" bottom_padding="2%" overlay_strength="0.3" shape_divider_position="bottom" bg_image_animation="none" shape_type=""][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="2/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom"][vc_column_text]

You're Not Failing, You're Learning

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]One of the top streamers in the world, SypherPK, became interested in spinning up a clothing business for a couple of reasons. He wanted to make clothing that was at a higher level of quality than what the community had come to expect. Additionally, he wanted to build something that could generate revenue when he eventually stopped streaming someday.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]Our team was a part of this from the ground floor and build it from there.
  1. Conceptulization
  2. Namestorming
  3. Moodboards
  4. Logo development
  5. Look and feel
  6. Brand Pyramid
  7. Voice and tone
  8. Marketing Strategy
  9. Go to market strategy
  10. Influencer Marketing
  11. Package Design
  12. Clothing Design
  13. Launch
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_row_inner column_margin="none" bottom_padding="20" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567618201809{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]For launch week, Metal Umbrella dominated Twitch and converted directly to great sales.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row type="full_width_background" full_screen_row_position="middle" column_margin="90px" scene_position="center" text_color="dark" text_align="left" top_padding="10%" bottom_padding="2%" overlay_strength="0.3" shape_divider_position="bottom" bg_image_animation="none" shape_type=""][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="2/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom"][vc_column_text]

Building Things Brick By Brick

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]When we met with LEGO they had a unique problem. They had a ton of great work being done in the video game space with their IP, but no centralized brand to house all the interactions around it. They had recently formed a team to specifically address this but realized they also did not have a brand to house it. Our team helped in a variety of ways from branding and package design to understanding the positioning LEGO GAMES had to take in the market and how developers and publishes ultimately marketed for them.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_row_inner column_margin="none" bottom_padding="20" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567618201809{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

CREATIVE FOR THE NEW WORLD

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]With WEB3 demand rising and AOE continuing to get requested help - we decided it made sense to spin up a brand that fit the look and feel of that market. I used this as an opportunity to flex my digital creative muscles to lead the project's branding, look and feel, web design, and eventually the web development. The development was a really fun opportunity to incorporate responsive 3D objects into design to create a living site. See for yourself at blastradius.agency Enjoy the work made by Blast Radius on our Behance.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_row_inner column_margin="none" bottom_padding="20" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567618201809{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]
