[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="2/3" tablet_width_inherit="default" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_row_inner column_margin="90px" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="padding-3-percent" column_padding_position="bottom" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom"][vc_column_text]

Award Winning Campaign

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Through the Outlaws, we achieved a lot of firsts in esports. The first player tour, pop up shop, and block party all contributed to being a Tempest Award winning campaign.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row type="full_width_background" full_screen_row_position="middle" column_margin="90px" scene_position="center" text_color="dark" text_align="left" top_padding="10%" bottom_padding="2%" overlay_strength="0.3" shape_divider_position="bottom" bg_image_animation="none" shape_type=""][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="2/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom"][vc_column_text]

The Biggest Names In Warzone

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]In the period between CDL majors, Activision approached us to help produce trailers and market their World Series Of Warzone event that featured the largest creators in the world duking it out for prizes. Our goal was to design a look and feel that worked for social media graphics but also for video content. We put together a full package of motion graphics, hand picked clips to highlight the creators, and music to create the best possible product that COD fans could get excited about.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_row_inner column_margin="none" bottom_padding="20" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567618201809{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

Into The Breach

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]After gaining backing from the Kraft group and obtaining the CDL Boston slot, Oxygen Esports had very little time and a lot of building to do for the team they inherited. Activision Blizzard refereed them to our team for building a brand after we had created the award winning OWL team, the Houston Outlaws.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]Our goal was to build a team that Bostonians will become a fan of, but also play into the narrative that Oxygen were facing. They were the new kids on the block lacking money, standing, and importantly time. Thinking through the motifs of American revolution and freedom, we built Breach with the idea of empowering the people. In a digital revolution, the Breach and the Collective are the means to shake things up in the CDL with old talent and money.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_row_inner column_margin="none" bottom_padding="20" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567618201809{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

Evolving With The Times

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]The fighting game industry is relatively small and I've been lucky enough to make a lot of friends thanks to commentary. I was esctatic to hear Rick / Hadou taking on the role of GM for Evolution after years of crushing it with Combobreaker. After congratulations were exchanged, Rick asked for a call and described the help he needed with web design, development, and graphic design.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]Eager to help a friend and working with the largest fighting game (a bucket list item personally) - we dove into the work. There were lots of initial discussions on balancing capabilities, constrictions, budget, and goals. From Nutmilk To Creamcheese

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]Paramount in combination with Funny Or Die aimed to put together a mockumentary of a League Of Legends team "Fugitive" climb to the NALCS and it's future with the star player Creamcheese. However, with limited time approaching the team needed branding. The team behind American Vandal were told to reach out by the LCS to solve their issue.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]After multiple calls to understand the plot, their vision, and needs - we put our heads down and went to work to build not only the current branding but previous iterations of the logo. This involved quite a bit of research of previous seasons team designs and their evolution over the years. At the end we were able to not only make multiple logos that are used in the show but additionally design all the merchandise used to create a believeable team. Forging Reality From Your Imagination

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner column_margin="60px" top_padding="15" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]AOE Creative forges a strong relationship between clients and our Creative Design and Marketing experts to connect with the modern, digital audience. AOE seamlessly integrate with your team and practices, ensuring rapid, efficient results and communication. The AOE approach our work with purpose and hunger to consistently improve. Our mastery of our craft comes hand in hand with the intensity of our passions.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/2" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text]I was one of the co-founders of AOE back in 2018. With building a businesses comes many hats. The roles I took on were head project manager, CTO, and marketer for the company. Our clients ranged from game developers, publishers, and anyone interested in gaming and nerd culture. A couple of our clients included Redbull, Blizzard Activision, Overwatch League, Call Of Duty League, Riot Games, Paramount and LEGO Games.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding="padding-1-percent" column_padding_position="top" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_link_target="_self" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" width="1/3" tablet_width_inherit="small_desktop" tablet_text_alignment="default" phone_text_alignment="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none" enable_animation="true" animation="fade-in-from-bottom" delay="100"][vc_row_inner column_margin="none" bottom_padding="20" text_align="left"][vc_column_inner column_padding="no-extra-padding" column_padding_position="all" background_color_opacity="1" background_hover_color_opacity="1" column_shadow="none" column_border_radius="none" column_link_target="_self" width="1/1" tablet_width_inherit="default" overlay_strength="0.3" column_border_width="none" column_border_style="solid" bg_image_animation="none"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1567618201809{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]
